metadata.feature_description: Test and validate URL rewriting functionality with detailed results

steps.action: Navigate to SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: TEST URL tab should be visible with URL rewriting test fields
steps.actual: TEST URL tab displayed with 'Test A Page URL' and 'Test URL Rewriting' sections

steps.action: Enter valid URL 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Home' in URL to Test field
steps.expected: URL should be accepted and Test URL Rewriting button should become enabled
steps.actual: URL was entered and Test URL Rewriting button became enabled

steps.expected: System should display rewriting results including page identification and redirection info
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: 'Default.aspx?TabId=21&language=en-US', Identified Language: 'en-US', Identified Page: 'Home', Redirection Result: 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL with complex query strings

steps.expected: URL with query strings should be properly parsed and rewritten
steps.actual: URL was processed successfully. Rewriting Result: 'Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US&category=televisions', Identified Page: 'Our Products'

steps.action: Enter URL containing special characters 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Test-Page--' (URL sanitized from page with special chars)
steps.expected: URL should be resolved to the page with original special character name
steps.actual: URL was correctly resolved. Identified Page: 'Test Page @#$%^&*()', Rewriting Result: 'Default.aspx?TabId=94&language=en-US'

steps.expected: System should handle non-existent page gracefully and show error information
steps.actual: System handled the URL gracefully. Identified Page: 'Home' (fallback). Operation Messages showed exception details about 404 error handling

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test malformed URL for error handling

steps.expected: System should detect invalid URL format and display appropriate error message
steps.actual: System correctly detected invalid URL. All result fields showed 'None'. Operation Messages: 'Invalid URI: The format of the URI could not be determined.'

steps.action: Select 'Our Products' from Page to Test dropdown and click Test URL
steps.expected: System should generate URLs for the selected page across all portal aliases

steps.action: Add query string 'category=electronics&filter=new' and click Test URL
steps.expected: Query string should be properly appended to generated URLs
steps.actual: Query string appended correctly. Generated URLs included '/filter/new?category=electronics' suffix across all portal aliases

observations: The URL rewriting test feature provides comprehensive information including Rewriting Result, Identified Language/Culture, Identified Page, Redirection Result, Redirection Reason, and Operation Messages
The system correctly handles both valid and invalid URLs with appropriate error messages
Query parameters are properly parsed and included in the rewriting results
The 'Test A Page URL' feature generates URLs for all configured portal aliases (default, en-us, es-es)
Special characters in page names are properly sanitized in URLs (e.g., '@#$%^&*()' becomes '--')
